import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Layaout from '../../parcials/Layaout'; import CardHeader from '../../../components/CardHeader' import { getCollaboration } from '../../../functions/collaboratorFunction'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import Stepper from '@material-ui/core/Stepper'; import Step from '@material-ui/core/Step'; import StepLabel from '@material-ui/core/StepLabel'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import Select from 'react-select'; import { MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput, MDBBtn, MDBIcon, MDBAnimation } from 'mdbreact'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { width: '100%', }, backButton: { marginRight: theme.spacing(1), }, instructions: { marginTop: theme.spacing(1), marginBottom: theme.spacing(1), }, })); function getSteps() { return ['Datos de venta', 'Facturación', 'Métodos de pago']; } function getStepContent(stepIndex) { switch (stepIndex) { case 0: return( ); case 1: return ( Factura De Sistema Factura Manual Factura COD Notas De Crédito ); case 2: return ( <> 1. Efectivo 2. Tarjetas 3. Cuota 4. Envios 5. Especiales 6. Certificados ); default: return 'Ooooups! Este paso no existe'; } } const TransferSystemPage = () => { const [dataStores, setdataSores] = useState([{ venta_diaria:0, no_personas:0, no_ventas:0, meta:0, venta_anterior:0, facturas_sis_desde:"-", facturas_sis_hasta:"-", facturas_sis_total:"-", facturas_man_desde:"-", facturas_man_hasta:"-", facturas_man_total:"-", facturas_cod_desde:"-", facturas_cod_hasta:"-", facturas_cod_total:"-", facturas_nota_desde:"-", facturas_nota_hasta:"-", facturas_nota_total:"-", }]); const classes = useStyles(); const [activeStep, setActiveStep] = React.useState(0); const steps = getSteps(); const handleNext = () => { setActiveStep((prevActiveStep) => prevActiveStep + 1); }; const handleBack = () => { setActiveStep((prevActiveStep) => prevActiveStep - 1); }; const handleReset = () => { setActiveStep(0); }; const value = { value: 'Selecciona una tienda', label: 'Selecciona una tienda' }; return (
{steps.map((label) => ( {label} ))}
{activeStep === steps.length ? (
All steps completed
) : (
{getStepContent(activeStep)}
)}
) } export default TransferSystemPage;
